homepage.global_description: Analysis, visualization, and prediction based on COVID-19 data.
homepage.long_description: This platform allows you to visualize the results of machine learning models applied to a COVID-19 dataset extracted from Kaggle. It facilitates the comparative analysis of various machine learning algorithms with the goal of predicting COVID-19-related mortality on a global scale.
homepage.section1_description: Raw data is collected, cleaned, transformed, and enriched automatically through an ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) pipeline. The pipeline ensures data consistency and quality before it is used for machine learning.
homepage.section2_description: Interactive charts are generated for each model: learning curves, residual plots, and performance metrics (MAE, RMSE, R²). These clear and accessible visualizations help explore the relevance and stability of the models.
homepage.section3_description: A variety of models have been trained, tested, and compared: linear regressions, decision trees, random forests, gradient boosting, and more. The best model is automatically selected based on several performance indicators.
homepage.section4_description: Thanks to the selected model, you can view mortality predictions for each country. The interface allows for comparison between countries, identification of high-risk areas, and evaluation of prediction reliability.
homepage.section5_description: Log in to access all features: exploration, visualizations, model comparison, and predictions.

predict.general_description: Use our advanced artificial intelligence model to predict the number of deaths based on comprehensive epidemiological data.
predict.description: Use this form to predict the number of COVID-19 deaths based on the provided data.
predict.about: This model uses comprehensive geographic, demographic, and epidemiological data to provide more accurate predictions. It takes into account the population, geographic region, and all COVID-19 indicators for a detailed analysis.
predict.info_prediction_result: Prediction based on an advanced artificial intelligence model
